content: पांसु(शु)ल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [पांसुरस्त्यस्य सिध्मा° लच्] {@--1@} Dusty, covered with dust; <ls>Māl. 2. 4.</ls> {@--2@} Polluted, defiled, sullied, stained; दारत्यागी भवाम्याहो परस्त्रीस्पर्शपांशुलः <ls>Ś. 5. 29.</ls> {@--3@} Defiling, disgracing, dishonouring; as in कुलपांसुल. --लः {@--1@} A profligate or licentious person, libertine, gallant. {@--2@} One of the weapons of Śiva. {@--3@} An epithet of Śiva. --ला {@--1@} A menstruous woman. {@--2@} An unchaste or licentious woman; अ° a chaste woman; <ls>R. 2. 2.</ls> {@--3@} The earth.
